name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Marketing Engineer with 8 years of experience in leveraging **JavaScript**, **Python**, and **Node.js** to create high-performance marketing solutions. Proficient in using tools such as **Customer.io**, **HubSpot**, **Zapier**, **Segment**, **PostHog**, **Google Tag Manager**, **Mixpanel**, **GA4**, and **Looker Studio** to analyze and optimize user engagement and conversion rates. Skilled in **HTML** and **CSS** for crafting responsive web pages with technologies like **Webflow** and **Unbounce**. 

Strong background in integrating AI technologies such as **OpenAI**, **LangChain**, **CrewAI**, **AutoGen**, and **Claude** to enhance automation and personalization in marketing strategies. Experienced in handling data with advanced tools including **Weaviate**, **Pinecone**, and **Chroma**, coupled with a robust understanding of REST APIs for seamless data integration. 

Effectively leads projects with proven capabilities in CI/CD practices, microservices architecture, and event-driven systems. I have developed comprehensive machine learning workflows, including pipelines, model serving, and MLOps using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Focused on delivering solutions that elevate customer experience while ensuring compliance with industry standards.
